name: Jewel Games Quest 2 - Match 3#
description:
The funniest jewel match 3 game ever. Loved by jewel quest fans and more then one hour is spent in this puzzle game everyday. Why don't you give it a try?

Millions fans have played this "Jewel Games Quest - Match 3" and "Jewel Games Quest 2 - Match 3". They spend an average of more than one hour playing this game every day. Download and check out why it is so attractive.

The 2nd generation of "Jewel Games Quest - Match 3" with more levels and move fun. Why don't you download free and have a try?

Many people love our 1st generation of "Jewel Games Quest - Match 3". And we're very sure you will like "Jewel Games Quest 2 - Match 3". FOR it has following new features:
- Real HD graphics.
- 9x9 canvas.
- More challenge levels. Total 230+ levels for latest version.
- New element: Rock. There some jewels covered by rock that you can not see it's color. You must guess the color and match jewels to destroy it.
- New element: Blue pothole.

This is a MUST-HAVE for anyone who likes jewel games!

"Jewel Games Quest 2 - Match 3" will be the BEST-looking jewel matching game for you iPhone, iPad or iPod Touch.

We're sure that you're going to love "Jewel Games Quest 2 - Match 3"! Please be sure to rate the game below. Your feedback will help us make the games you love even better.

Please note that there are in-app items that you can purchase with real money. To delete this feature, on your device go to Setting Menu->General->Restrictions option. You can then simply turn off In-App Purchases under "Allowed Content".
